column4: can someone please help me i am trying to figure out why my computer randomly freezes when running ubuntu

my machine will randomly hard lock when running ubuntu this can occur at anytime and i can not seem to diagnose what is causing it i think it might be something with my graphics card (nvidia) not wanting to get along with my mother board which has ati chipset on the north ans south bridge
any help would be greatly appreciated
Did you check RAM with memtest86+?
